parameters.name: ModelName
parameters.description: Name of the model in the flat-pattern view

title: IDrawingDoc.ChangeRefConfigurationOfFlatPatternView
description: Changes the configuration of the selected flat-pattern view of the specified model.
signature:
System.Boolean ChangeRefConfigurationOfFlatPatternView( 
   System.String
ModelName
,
   System.String
ConfigName
)

parameters.name: ModelName
parameters.description: Name of the model in the flat-pattern view

returns: True if the configuration was successfully changed, false if not
remarks: Before calling this method, you must select the flat-pattern view of the model.
